verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Call me deeper
Into Your grace
The river that flows
From the holy place
Wash over me
Cleansing me through
My greatest love is You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ev'ry new day
Your glory unfolds
Filling my eyes
With Your treasures untold
The beauty of holiness
Brings worship anew
My greatest love is You
